scripts.watch: parcel watch client/js/index.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/ && parcel watch client/js/metadataTemplateEditor.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/ && parcel watch client/js/metadataForm.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/
scripts.build: parcel build client/js/index.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/ && parcel build client/js/metadataTemplateEditor.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/ && parcel build client/js/metadataForm.js -d static/dist --public-url /static/dist/
